proof:
The proof relies on a chain of inequalities that begins with an application of Lemma 3.4. Specifically, we have:
$|P_i| \le \lceil \frac{n_i}{\lceil n_i \Delta^2 / n \rceil} \rceil \le \frac{n_i}{n_i \Delta^2 / n} + 1 \le \frac{2n}{\Delta^2} + 1 \le \frac{3n}{\Delta^2}$.
The second inequality in this sequence holds because it is given that $\frac{n_i \Delta^2}{n} \ge 1$. The final inequality is a consequence of the condition $\Delta < \sqrt{n}$.
